page.title: 03A Day In The Life Of Karen
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock and get dressed. Sometimes I have breakfast, then I go to our school, which is 144 years old. We play all sorts of games at playtimes. In class we do Maths, English, Music and Art with some sewing, woodwork and computing. On Mondays we go to Silverdale for games - skittleball, football and rounders. On Tuesdays we do P.E. in the village hall. On Thursdays we go swimming at Carnforth High School. When I go home on Mondays and Fridays, I go to choir practice and on Wednesdays I go to Guides, both in Warton. I also go to extra swimming lessons at Capenwray Hall on Thursdays. By Karen
